title: ID This font please!!!!! ( It should be in the serif family )
content:
I am trying to edit a pdf. The font cannot be edited because it is not installed or embedded in the pdf. If anyone can identify this font for me, so i can install it to proceed, I would be most grateful.

-John Bagnal

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [UNKN Font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202145738/http:/typophile.com/files/UNKN%20Font.jpg) | 41.72 KB |
author: johnbagnal

comments.content: Joy! This time even I know, itÂ´s Arial.
Thanks. I thought it looked familiar. Apparently the third party program I am using doesn't recognize it. Oh well, worth a shot.
And, by the way, Arial it's _sans-serif_.
